attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Come on Gordon, house prices are gaining traction, employment is going up, and people are heading back into the shops and spending money. Surely the time has come to think about increasing the interest rate from its deplorably low level of 0.5%and give the pensioners and savers of this land something to get happy about. After all, we’re the honest lot who didn’t spend recklessly.

rejection.details: Interest rates are a matter for the Bank of England.
reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
